item.title: Day 25 - CI/CD
item.description: A week off I was absent for a week, due to my position in life. I am in the last year of high school and I am preparing for The Final Exam, so I don’t have much time nowadays. I’m explaining myself here only in front of… myself! I feel bad when I can’t pay that much atention to study programming as I should, so I’m about to changing that. Work daily Simon, small steps - but daily.
